entry.name: QUnit.log
entry.title: QUnit.log()
entry.desc: Register a callback to fire whenever an assertion completes.
entry.longdesc:
This is one of several callbacks QUnit provides. Its intended for integration scenarios like PhantomJS or Jenkins.
The properties of the details argument are listed below as options.

option.name: result
option.desc: The boolean result of an assertion, true means passed, false means failed.

option.name: actual
option.desc: One side of a comparision assertion. Can be undefined when ok() is used.

option.name: expected
option.desc: One side of a comparision assertion. Can be undefined when ok() is used.

option.name: message
option.desc: A string description provided by the assertion.

example.desc: Register a callback that logs assertion result and its message to the console.
